title: Hello!
text:
Welcome to note taker
Please leave a note here 
Please enter a title, then your note, and then save it using the icon to the right
Your note will appear to the left under your selected title.
Thank you for using note taker!

title: Hello again!
text:
Would you like to see your saved note?
Select your note to the left to see it displayed here in the main window
Want to leave a new note?
Select the pencil icon on the upper right.
Thank you for using note taker!
